      Build a university in the city 1.
      void Economist.improveCropYield​(Player player, City city)
      Economists get a bonus when doing crops improvements Crop improvement still costs 500 gold Crop is improved by 50 + round((intelligence + experience + leadership) * 0.2) If the player does not have enough gold, throw an exception Else decrease 500 golds from the player and improves crops by the calculated amount
      void Minister.improveCropYield​(Player player, City city)
      Improve the crop yields in a city Improve Crop yields by 50 for 500 golds If the player does not have enough gold, throw an exception Else decrease 500 golds from the player and improves crops by 50
      void Minister.recruitTroops​(Player player, City city)
      Recruit troops to be stationed in a city Recruit 50 troops for 500 golds If the player does not have enough gold, throw an exception
      void WarGeneral.recruitTroops​(Player player, City city)
      Recruits more troops than superclass implementation, troops added to city = 50 + round(leadership * 0.2).
      void Minister.upgradeTech​(Player player, Technology technology)
      Upgrades tech 1.
